pli-tv-bi-vb-pc81:1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā rājagahe viharati veḷuvane kalandakanivāpe.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc81:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena thullanandā bhikkhunī—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc81:1.3: “sikkhamānaṃ vuṭṭhāpessāmī”ti there bhikkhū sannipātetvā pahūtaṃ khādanīyaṃ bhojanīyaṃ passitvā—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc81:1.4: “na tāvāhaṃ, ayyā, sikkhamānaṃ vuṭṭhāpessāmī”ti there bhikkhū uyyojetvā devadattaṃ kokālikaṃ kaṭamodakatissakaṃ khaṇḍadeviyā puttaṃ samuddadattaṃ sannipātetvā sikkhamānaṃ vuṭṭhāpesi.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc81:1.5: Yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā …pe… tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc81:1.6: “kathañhi nāma ayyā thullanandā pārivāsikachandadānena sikkhamānaṃ vuṭṭhāpessatī”ti …pe…
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc81:1.7: “saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, thullanandā bhikkhunī pārivāsikachandadānena sikkhamānaṃ vuṭṭhāpetī”ti?
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc81:1.10: kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, thullanandā bhikkhunī pārivāsikachandadānena sikkhamānaṃ vuṭṭhāpessati.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc81:1.12: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc81:1.13: “Yā pana bhikkhunī pārivāsikachandadānena sikkhamānaṃ vuṭṭhāpeyya, pācittiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc81:2.1.11: “Vuṭṭhāpessāmī”ti gaṇaṃ vā ācariniṃ vā pattaṃ vā cīvaraṃ vā pariyesati, sīmaṃ vā sammannati, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc81:2.1.15: Gaṇassa ca ācariniyā ca āpatti dukkaṭassa.
